basic.description: Behaviour, analysis and design of pretensioned and post-tensioned concrete systems including simply-supported and continuous beams, and two-way slabs. Considerations of prestress losses, cracking and deflection. A design project is undertaken in this course. Three term-hours, winter; lectures and tutorials.
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Prestressed Concrete

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of CIVL 430 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
